name: AutomationPolicyPrecheck
summary: ResumeGenius automation policy precheck for talent workflows.
description: Review resume-generation automation against privacy, consent, and brand governance rules before enabling a new workflow.
acceptance_criteria: Confirms applicable automation and change-management policies for the proposed update.
Documents potential compliance risks with recommended mitigations or required approvals.
Validates candidate consent handling and records the go/no-go recommendation with approvers.

name: ATSFitAnalyzer
summary: Assess resume alignment with a target job using ATS scoring insights.
description: Leverage the ATS scoring service to evaluate resume compatibility, highlight strengths and gaps, and recommend concrete optimization steps tailored to the job description.
acceptance_criteria: Presents the ATS compatibility score with a short explanation of the scoring rubric and any confidence limits.
Summarizes matched strengths and identifies the most critical missing keywords or experience gaps relative to the job description.
Delivers a prioritized list of optimization actions with guidance on how to adjust resume content or structure.

triggers: Score below threshold without actionable mitigations

name: ResumePipelineQualityReview
summary: Audit resume generation pipelines for ATS alignment and policy compliance.
description: Sample recent resume outputs to evaluate ATS scores, identify systemic gaps, and recommend iterative improvements.
acceptance_criteria: Reports ATS scores across the sampled resumes with insight into the scoring rubric and variance.
Highlights recurring keyword or experience gaps that reduce interview conversion potential.
Documents remediation actions, including policy or privacy considerations for content updates.

name: SegmentPipeline
summary: Identify nurture cohorts that need outreach this cycle.
description: Analyze the resume improvement pipeline to group prospects by engagement stage, risk of churn, and urgency.
acceptance_criteria: Generates prioritized cohorts based on stage, inactivity, and conversion likelihood.
Validates contact permissions and readiness for outreach before exporting segments.
Documents rationale for each segment along with recommended cadence adjustments.

name: DraftTouchpoints
summary: Compose outreach sequences for prioritized pipeline segments.
description: Author tailored messaging for each cohort, ensuring tone, compliance, and personalization guidance align with brand voice.
acceptance_criteria: Produces copy variants for each segment that reference relevant pain points and value props.
Includes required compliance language, unsubscribe information, and channel-specific constraints.
Captures personalization tokens and follow-up prompts for campaign automation.

triggers: Message conflicts with brand or legal guidelines

name: ScheduleCampaign
summary: Schedule and activate the nurture campaign across cohorts.
description: Load drafted touchpoints into the outreach platform, configure send windows, and confirm monitoring hooks.
acceptance_criteria: Schedules the cadence for each cohort with appropriate send windows and throttling.
Configures tracking for replies, conversions, and escalations back into the CRM.
Confirms successful scheduling and documents contingency steps if delivery fails.
